verses.name: Numbers 23:1
verses.text: And Balaam said unto Balak, Build me here seven altars, and prepare me here seven oxen and seven rams.

verses.name: Numbers 23:2
verses.text: And Balak did as Balaam had spoken; and Balak and Balaam offered on every altar a bullock and a ram.

verses.name: Numbers 23:3
verses.text: And Balaam said unto Balak, Stand by thy burnt offering, and I will go: peradventure the Lord will come to meet me: and whatsoever he sheweth me I will tell thee. And he went to an high place.
